name: Molydeus
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, poisoned, stunned

traits.Legendary Resistance (3/Day): If the molydeus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
traits.Magic Resistance: The molydeus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Magic Weapons: The molydeus's weapon attacks are magical.

options.Attack: The molydeus makes one attack, either with its demonic weapon or with its snakebite.
options.Move: The molydeus moves without provoking opportunity attacks.
options.Cast a Spell: The molydeus casts one spell from its Innate Spellcasting trait.
